data.description: The objective of health services is to ensure the physical and mental well-being of students and staff.The objective of health services is to ensure the physical and mental well-being of students and staff.

points: Provide access to medical consultations and first aid.
Organize health awareness programs and workshops.
Promote mental health support and counseling.
Ensure a hygienic and safe campus environment.
Encourage regular health check-ups.

data.description: The objective of IT support is to provide reliable and efficient technology services to students and staff.

points: Maintain and upgrade campus IT infrastructure.
Provide technical support for hardware and software issues.
Ensure secure and fast internet connectivity.
Organize training sessions on new technologies.
Promote the use of digital tools for learning and administration.

data.description: The objective of environmental initiatives is to promote sustainability and environmental awareness on campus.

points: Encourage waste segregation and recycling.
Organize tree plantation drives and green campaigns.
Promote the use of renewable energy sources.
Conduct workshops on environmental conservation.
Foster a culture of eco-friendly practices.

data.description: The objective of career services is to guide students in achieving their professional goals.

points: Provide career counseling and guidance.
Organize job fairs and campus recruitment drives.
Offer training on resume building and interview skills.
Facilitate internships and industry exposure.
Build partnerships with companies for placement opportunities.

data.description: The objective of community engagement is to foster social responsibility and active participation in community development.

points: Organize volunteer programs and social drives.
Collaborate with NGOs for community projects.
Promote awareness on social issues.
Encourage students to participate in outreach activities.
Build a culture of empathy and service.
